bibl.title: From Model Tools to Written Tablets: The Ptolemies in Egypt.
Studies in Memory of Zbigniew Borkowski
bibl.author: THOMPSON, Dorothy J.

bibl.note: Under the Ptolemies the Egyptian temples remained bastions of Egyptian culture, but even in this aspect of native live the effect of Greek language, culture and literacy may, in the foundation deposits of the Serapeum at Alexandria, be seen to be taking effect.
THOMPSON Dorothy J., From Model Tools to Written Tablets: The Ptolemies in Egypt.
Studies in Memory of Zbigniew Borkowski = JJurP 23 (1993) pp. 149-156.
